about_the_game:
A game made for the ones we lost on the way.




Experience a surreal, linear walking simulator that explores the themes of death and grieving the passing of a loved one. Waking up in a unknown forest, you find yourself lost and looking for answers, will you find what the clarification you have been looking for or will you find more questions then answers.

Dealing with grief and loss

A thing that everyone is forced to deal with for as long as humankind came into being is loss and grief. So we wanted to make a game that wasn't just special to us but that can also be special to people struggling with the same issues.

A show don't tell journey

Memento Mori is a show, don't tell experience that can be enjoyed by anyone and everyone no matter what language they speak due to the lack of dialogue and text.

WolfWare Studios

WolfWare Studios is a independent game development duo who started making Memento Mori during the second quarter of 2022. Before the production of Memento Mori both Shea Kelly (Creative lead) and Alekzandar Voynikov (Technical lead) made video games for game jams and to produce a medium they have both loved for as long as they can remember.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A game for the ones we lost on the way. Memento Mori is a surreal walking simulator that combines a minimalistic art style and a show don't tell story, focused on dealing with loss.
